rules_text:
Reach
When Risti Watchkeeper enters the battlefield, rediscover a creature card. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may reveal it and put it into your hand if it's a creature card. Otherwise, put it back or into your graveyard.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]“Used to be only Angel mechs in the sky. Now, it's anyone's guess.”[/i]
